description:
Yuma Mukami appears in the bathroom during Yui Komori`s bath and pulls her out.
Yuma takes Yui to a well-kept garden where he grows vegetables.
Yui asks his purpose for growing them if vampires don`t need to eat food like humans.
Yuma begins to talk about his and the Mukami brothers` past, but in the middle of the conversation, he suddenly feeds on Yui`s blood...
Source: crunchyroll
